content.question: Split-brain research has illustrated which of the following?

choices.label: The right hemisphere of the brain is responsible for language in most people.
The left hemisphere of the brain is responsible for language in most people.
The prefrontal cortex is responsible for thinking, planning, and decision making.
The brain functions normally after the corpus callosum is cut.

content.answer: The left hemisphere of the brain is responsible for language in most people.
